These bulk accounts can be imported from a comma-separated values (CSV) document or

The template to export and import file is in CSV format

questions.question_text:
An organization is migrating its current guest network to Cisco ISE and has 1000 guest users in the current database. There are no resources to enter this information into the Cisco ISE database manually.
What must be done to accomplish this task efficiently?

choices.C: Use a JSON file to automate the migration of guest accounts.
choices.A: Use an XML file to change the existing format to match that of Cisco ISE.
choices.D: Use SQL to link the existing database to Cisco ISE.
choices.B: Use a CSV file to import the guest accounts.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D-- AD does this protocol

Selected Answer: D
Kerberos Authentication for the Sponsor Portal
You can configure Cisco ISE to use Kerberos to authenticate a sponsor user who is logged onto Windows for access to the sponsor portal. This process uses the Active Directory credentials of the logged in sponsor user in the Kerberos ticket. Kerberos SSO is performed inside the secure tunnel after the browser establishes the SSL connection with Cisco ISE.

questions.question_text:
A customer wants to set up the Sponsor portal and delegate the authentication flow to a third party for added security while using Kerberos.
Which database should be used to accomplish this goal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
B & E is correct

questions.question_text: What is the minimum certainty factor when creating a profiler policy?

choices.A: the minimum number that a predefined condition provides
choices.B: the maximum number that a predefined condition provides
choices.C: the minimum number that a device certainty factor must reach to become a member of the profile
choices.D: the maximum number that a device certainty factor must reach to become a member of the profile
